title: Suspect in Toronto attack charged with murder
text:
Suspect in Toronto attack charged with murder 2:10pm BST - 02:10 
The driver suspected of killing 10 people and injuring 15 others when he plowed a rental van into pedestrians in Toronto made his first court appearance on Tuesday, where details of a motive for the attack were expected to emerge.   
The driver suspected of killing 10 people and injuring 15 others when he plowed a rental van into pedestrians in Toronto made his first court appearance on Tuesday, where details of a motive for the attack were expected to emerge.  //reut.rs/2FcnI4I
